description:
wife of Nabal, then of David 1Sam 25:14; 1Sam 25:23; 1Sam 25:39; 1Sam 25:40; 1Sam 25:42; 1Sam 27:3; 1Sam 30:5; 2Sam 2:2; 1Chr 3:1 = אֲבִגַיִל
1Sam 25:3; 1Sam 25:36
אֲבִו֯גַיִל 1Sam 25:18, אֲבִיגָל֑ 1Sam 25:32, אֲבִיגַ֯לִ
2Sam 3:3.
